Description: Pale green glazed composition shabti of Ankhhap.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 55 [26]. Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt, Japan 1999-2000, [110].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces 2012 23 March -23 July , Musee Jaquemart Andre, Paris, Le Crepuscule des Pharaons 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed
